VEF.Storyteller.QuestChainDef.label: The Cryptoforge
VEF.Storyteller.QuestChainDef.description: This quest chain will have you travel to the arctic regions to find the location of a legendary cryptoforge - an ancient space ship with a workshop capable of developing the cryptogear. Given enough time and skill, you may be able to craft the legendary ultratech gear of the nomadic space warriors.
